name: Combat Ace
synopsis: Are you ready to feel the adrenalin pumping? This is your time to shine and become a heroic world war pilot. As the enemies close in it's your mission to make sure you survive and live another day to fight in the war against evil. Different weapons with guns and missiles are available for you to choose from. You get to pick what you think is up to the task. Don't sit back and relax though, the enemy is always right there to surprise you and put up a good fight, and if you don't use the radar lock detector they will not hesitate to shoot you down. In this game the enemy shows no mercy.
